>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.UVNOjH2ERlQjcGnU]{Zenith Revelation}

 @Icon[type:photon] Photon Revelation

You can imitate the glory of a spinning pulsar. When you are fully photon-attuned, you can make a sudden spin as a standard action, emitting high-energy particles in a 120-foot line centered on you and extending 60 feet in either direction. Creatures in the affected squares other than you are exposed to low @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#radiation]{Radiation}. When you reach 6th level, creatures within your pulsar spin are exposed to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#radiation-levels]{Medium Radiation} instead; at 12th level, they’re exposed to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#radiation-levels]{High Radiation}, and at 20th level, they’re exposed to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#radiation-levels]{Extreme Radiation}.

In addition, when you use this power, any creature within 10 feet of you must succeed at a Fortitude save or be rendered @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.yUtkoIshf4dPruNd]{Off-Target} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round by the tumultuous magnetic waves.
